content:
I am planning a trip to a new country I have not been to before. Can you provide me with the details of the country, including its capital, region, and currency? Additionally, I would like to know the list of states within the country and their respective latitude and longitude.
Begin!

Sure, I'll help you. To proceed, I need you to provide the name or code of your planned destination country. If you aren't sure of the exact name or code, a quick clarification can help narrow it down. Let me know your destination country!

function.arguments: {"return_type":"give_answer","final_answer":"Could you please provide me with the name or code of the country you plan to visit? This will allow me to fetch all its details for you."}
function.name: Finish
